New Records: Rodri, capped 53 times by Spain, has been a standout performer for both Manchester City and his national team, contributing significantly to their success.
Lamine Yamal, at 16, became the youngest player to feature in the knockout rounds of a European Championship and has been pivotal for Barcelona and Spain.
Key Match Events: Rodri and Yamal played crucial roles in Spain's 4-1 victory over Georgia in the last 16, with Rodri scoring a crucial equalizer and Yamal setting up Fabian Ruiz for a goal.
Germany's Toni Kroos has been a standout performer in midfield, leading in touches, passes, and other key metrics at Euro 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: Germany's Toni Kroos praised Spain's Rodri and Lamine Yamal, acknowledging their qualities and the threat they pose.
Both Germany and Spain are bidding for an unprecedented fourth European Championship title, with only one able to advance to the semi-finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Spain and Germany are both aiming for historic achievements, with only one able to set up a semi-final clash against Portugal or France.
Toni Kroos will retire from international football after this tournament, marking the end of a illustrious career.
